# The `MutableBinaryByteStream` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystream">BinaryStream</a> which holds its entire data set in a single contiguous buffer. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

An implementation of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarystream">BinaryStream</a> which holds its entire data set in a single contiguous buffer.

As with <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binarybytestream">BinaryByteStream</a>, the mutable version also guarantees that no read operation will ever incur a copy, and similarly it does not own the underlying buffer.

Definition at line 88 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarybytestream-h">BinaryByteStream.h</a>.

### writeBytes() {#ab01e4768ed6edae5181351ec2fc8be15}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::MutableBinaryByteStream::writeBytes (uint64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; uint8&#95;t &gt; Data)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Attempt to write the given bytes into the stream at the desired offset.

This will always necessitate a copy. Cannot shrink or grow the stream, only writes into existing allocated space.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarybytestream-h/#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/binarybytestream-h">BinaryByteStream.h</a>.
